_header: Almighty God blessed might he be
Subjects: carols, Nativity; Christmastide; Christ, birth of
_description: Christmas carol — four quatrains (aaab) and burden (bb): ‘Man lat be þi cruelnese / And be glad of crystmese’

OxfLinLat141.First Lines:
Al myty god blyssyd myth he beHath sent hys sone thorow hys
                    pyteTo sle pryd and cruelteAnd draw vs to hys
                    kyndnes…
OxfLinLat141.Last Lines:
…he bryng vs all in to hys towreWhere is bot euer
                    blysseMan lat be þi cruelneseAnd be glad of crystmese
OxfLinLat141.Editions:
Palti,  Kathleen. 
             “An Unpublished Fifteenth-Century Carol Collection: Oxford, Lincoln
                College MS Lat. 141.” 
             Medium Aevum.
         77 (2008): 260-78: 169-70.
